dct_alternative_sm: Map of the United States : compiled from the most authentic sources and most respectfully inscribed to the citizens of the United States by the publisher / engraved and published by M.M. Peabody.
dct_description_sm: 1 map : col., mounted on linen ; 47 x 63 cm.
Map extends below lower neat line to include the islands of Cuba, Hispaniola and Jamaica.
Includes double hemisphere map of the world and illustration of the Capitol at Washington below lower border of map.

Includes inset table showing populations of the states and territories in 1820 and 1830, distances of major cities to Washington, lengths of principal rivers, major lakes and the amount of water they contain and the amount of public debt of the United States in 1827.
Shows magnetic declination at 45‚Å∞ north latitude in 1831.
dct_rights_sm: This map is in the public domain.
